about_the_game: Thrae is a cozy crafting adventure game, where you play as a bunny on his path to become the Legendary Easter Bunny! Build relationships, Craft, Decorate & Deliver Enchanted eggs to heal your friends of the forest!
detailed_description: Thrae is a cozy crafting adventure game, where you play as a bunny on his path to become the Legendary Easter Bunny! Build relationships, Craft, Decorate & Deliver Enchanted eggs to heal your friends of the forest!
name: Thrae Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10/11
  • Processor: potato
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia rtx 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10/11
  • Processor: potato
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Thrae is a cozy crafting adventure game, where you play as a bunny on his path to become the Legendary Easter Bunny! Build relationships, Craft, Decorate & Deliver Enchanted eggs to heal your friends of the forest!
